channel.title: Server help!
channel.description: OK...I have searched the threads and everything... I tried one of the server builders. I have no idea what to do with it. I realy want a server but hae no idea how to make one! It's making me really mad. if someone could just help me my email is firedragon159@hotmail.com I really want a server so, if you make me one, or just help me make one with the stuff i have, i will be very grateful.

item.title: Server help!
item.dc:creator: @e0n e0n™
item.description:
@e0n wrote:

Dude calm down, your saved. Go to Tutorial section of forums and go to: The Guardian’s Server Guide (its not called that, but you will know when you see it). EVERYTHING you need to know is there. Its even stickied …dont know how you missed it…

e0n

Read full topic

item.title: Server help!

OK…I have searched the threads and everything… I tried one of the server builders. I have no idea what to do with it. I realy want a server but hae no idea how to make one! It’s making me really mad. if someone could just help me my email is firedragon159@hotmail.com I really want a server so, if you make me one, or just help me make one with the stuff i have, i will be very grateful.
